name: Crab Rave Token
description: What is the project about? Our project is the first ever community Meme token that is powered and ran by the community, Raise funds for community event, Make a fun meme coin that can bring people together in real life and digitally, launch NFT marketplace with fun crab NFT's, have fun building a community & MAKE CRAB MEMES. What makes your project unique? Our project is unique in so many ways, No dev liquidity pools, we blacklist bots so they can not drain the liquidity, our liquidity to market cap ratio is very high so this will attract big whales and ensure a safe secure trading, 70% of the crab tokens are owned by the community & 30% locked LP. First ever safe meme coin, don't have to worry about getting rugged, or your money being taken from the founders or the dev's, the dev's were paid up front and manage the project behind the scenes to ensure safe fun trading. Our community has grown by 200% in the past 48 hours and keeps growing with funny meme's all over the internet. History of your project. Our history we got burned and rugged on so many meme coins that we wanted to set a new standard of meme coin, one ran and owned by the community & powered by the community, so Crab Rave Token was born within 32 hours after the idea to set a new standard of meme coins. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are building a NFT marketplace and will be releasing NFT's & PFP's out to our crabtastic community & to only grow from here. What can your token be used for? Phase-1 Trading buy & sell. Pahse-2 NFT marketplace which crab rave tokens can be used to purchase the NFT's or PFP's.
